text: NPC is a meme. NPC is sometimes called NPC Wojak. NPC stands for Non-Playable- character. The NPC meme is normally used to express that people who like the political left do not think for themselves. The NPC meme looks similar to the Wojak meme. The NPC meme was made in July 2016 by an unknown person. The first NPC meme was uploaded to the website 4chan, and the idea behind the meme was explained there. The NPC meme is famous, and has been shown on many news websites, for example on The New York Times, The Verge, BBC and Breitbart News Network. ==References== Category:Internet culture
title: NPC (meme)
